article_title: House Republicans Retain Counsel to Explore Guantanamo Suit Against Obama
article_text:
WASHINGTON—House Republicans have hired attorneys for legal advice about a possible lawsuit if the Obama administration tries to transfer detainees from the Guantanamo Bay prison facility to the U.S.

The House GOP has contracted with lawyers from Jones Day for up to $150,000 to prepare a legal response if the administration seeks to move detainees to the U.S., according to a Republican leadership aide.

“Congress has spoken,...
